ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Marc Lesage ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. MARC LESAGE, a puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Quebec in and for the Province of Quebec, effective September 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
